Top! Banyuwangi Jadi Tuan Rumah Liga Surfing Dunia Tahun 2020
01 Nov 2019, 14:51 by Ardian Fanani


Foto: Ilustrasi surfing (iStock)

Banyuwangi - Kabar gembira dari Banyuwangi. Kabupaten di paling timur Pulau Jawa ini akan jadi tuan rumah liga surfing paling bergengsi di dunia tahun 2020.Kabupaten Banyuwangi dipilih menjadi tuan rumah seri ke-3 World Surf League (WSL) Championship Tour 2020 yang merupakan ajang selancar paling bergengsi di dunia. Sebanyak 54 peselancar terbaik dunia akan mengikuti kejuaraan dunia selancar tersebut yang bakal digelar di Pantai Plengkung (G-Land), Banyuwangi, 4-14 Juni 2020.Bupati Banyuwangi Abdullah Azwar Anas mengatakan, kabar itu disampaikan Manajer WSL Asia Steven Roberston. WSL sendiri adalah badan pengelola ajang selancar dunia."Kami sudah bertemu tim WSL Asia. Rapat WSL di AS memutuskan satu dari 11 seri kompetisi selancar terbaik dunia 2020 akan digelar di Banyuwangi. Ini kalau di tenis ya semacam grand slam-nya yang hanya empat event dalam setahun. Jadi sangat membanggakan bagi Banyuwangi," ujar Anas, Jumat (1/11/2019).


Anas (paling kanan) (Ardian Fanani/detikcom)

WSL Championship Tour adalah liga selancar paling bergengsi di dunia. Tur ini berisi 11 ajang selancar yang biasanya dimulai sejak April-Desember setiap tahunnya di berbagai pantai di dunia. Tahun ini, WSL Championship Tour antara lain digelar di Australia, Amerika Serikat, Brazil, Hawaii, Tahiti, Afrika Selatan, Portugal, hingga Prancis."Banyak daerah di belahan dunia lain yang sangat berminat menjadi tuan rumah. Kami bersyukur, justru Banyuwangi dipilih WSL. Saya akan sampaikan kabar baik ini ke Gubernur Jatim Ibu Khofifah dan pemerintah pusat agar bisa dimanfaatkan sebagai momen menggaungkan pariwisata Banyuwangi, Jatim, dan Indonesia," kata Anas.Anas menambahkan, momen WSL Championship Tour sangat sayang untuk dilewatkan karena event ini menduduki peringkat atas liga olahraga yang digemari penduduk dunia setelah sepak bola, basket, dan football."Social engagement ajang ini sangat tinggi. Bahkan, percakapan tentang WSL Championship Tour di dunia maya selalu mampu mengalahkan MotoGP yang hanya menduduki peringkat 9. Penyelenggaraan WSL akan diliput belasan TV asing yang coverage-nya bisa mencapai 643 juta penonton," ujar Anas mengutip data WSL."Secara ekonomi bakal sangat menggerakkan ekonomi lokal karena setelah ajang ini para penggemar selancar seluruh dunia pasti kian tertarik ke Banyuwangi," imbuhnya.Manajer WSL Asia, Steven Robertson, menjelaskan, Banyuwangi dipilih karena perhatian pemerintah daerahnya yang cukup besar pada pengembangan sport tourism."Saat pertemuan di Amerika Serikat, kami memilih G-Land sebagai satu dari 11 seri yang akan kami gelar 2020. Kami siapkan dana USD 2,5 juta (sekitar Rp35 miliar). Saya pikir, Banyuwangi adalah daerah yang tepat karena pemerintahnya sudah terbiasa menggelar event sport tourism," kata Steven.Steven menjelaskan, G-Land dipilih karena tidak hanya punya ombak bagus, namun lokasinya yang berada di kawasan taman nasional adalah keelokan tersendiri.


Pantai-pantai di Taman Nasional Alas Purwo (Ardian Fanani/detikTravel)

"Ini akan menjadi cerita menarik bagi peselancar dunia. Mereka bakal berselancar di pantai yang berada di tengah hutan elok. Experience semacam ini akan menjadi cerita positif di kalangan peselancar seluruh dunia," kata Steven.G-Land berada di kawasan Taman Nasional Alas Purwo. Hutan ini telah ditetapkan sebagai geopark nasional dan Cagar Biosfer Dunia oleh UNESCO. G-Land dikenal salah satu lokasi selancar terbaik di dunia karena ombaknya yang khas, besar, dan membentuk terowongan.Simak Video "Seru Banget! Bersepeda dan Berlari di Cagar Biosfer Dunia"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/aff)

Top! Banyuwangi Hosts the 2020 World Surfing League
Nov 01 2019, 14:51 by Ardian Fanani


Photo: Illustration of surfing (iStock)

Banyuwangi - Good news from Banyuwangi. This regency in the easternmost island of Java will host the most prestigious surfing league in the world in 2020. Banyuwangi Regency was chosen to host the 3rd series of the World Surf League (WSL) Championship Tour 2020 which is the most prestigious surfing event in the world. A total of 54 of the world's best surfers will take part in the surfing world championship which will be held at Plengkung Beach, Banyuwangi, 4-14 June 2020. Banyuwangi Regent Abdullah Azwar Anas said the news was delivered by WSL Asia Manager Steven Roberston. WSL itself is the world surfing event management body. "We have met the WSL Asia team. The WSL meeting in the US decided that one of the 11 series of the world's best surfing competition in 2020 will be held in Banyuwangi. in a year. So very proud of Banyuwangi, "said Anas, Friday (11/01/2019).


Anas (far right) (Ardian Fanani / detikcom)

WSL Championship Tour is the most prestigious surfing league in the world. This tour contains 11 surfing events that usually start from April to December each year on various beaches in the world. This year, the WSL Championship Tour will be held in Australia, the United States, Brazil, Hawaii, Tahiti, South Africa, Portugal and France. "Many regions in other parts of the world are very interested in hosting. We are grateful, instead Banyuwangi was chosen by WSL. "I will convey this good news to East Java Governor Mrs. Khofifah and the central government so that it can be used as a moment of echoing tourism in Banyuwangi, East Java and Indonesia," Anas said. sports league which is popular with the world's population after soccer, basketball, and football. "Social engagement of this event is very high. In fact, conversations about the WSL Championship Tour in cyberspace are always able to beat MotoGP which is only ranked 9. The holding of WSL will be covered by dozens of foreign TVs whose coverage could reach 643 million viewers, "Anas quoted WSL data." The economy will be very open t move the local economy because after this event surfing fans all over the world will definitely be increasingly attracted to Banyuwangi, "he added. WSL Asia Manager, Steven Robertson, explained, Banyuwangi was chosen because of the considerable local government attention on developing sports tourism." During a meeting in America Union, we chose G-Land as one of the 11 series we will be holding in 2020. We have prepared a USD 2.5 million fund (around Rp35 billion). I think, Banyuwangi is the right area because the government is accustomed to holding sport tourism events, "said Steven. Steven explained, G-Land was chosen because not only has good waves, but its location in the national park area is its own beauty.


Beaches in Alas Purwo National Park (Ardian Fanani / detikTravel)

"This will be an interesting story for world surfers. They will surf on the beach in the middle of a beautiful forest. Experience like this will be a positive story among surfers around the world," said Steven. G-Land is in the Alas Purwo National Park. This forest has been designated as a national geopark and World Biosphere Reserve by UNESCO. G-Land is known to be one of the best surfing locations in the world because of its distinctive, large, and tunnel-shaped waves. Watch the video "Very Exciting! Cycling and Running in the World Biosphere Reserve" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (aff / aff)
